participant_1.background:
I lost my childhood dog when I was 10.
I relax and spend time with my friends and family when I am not working.
i moved far from home.
I live in a house with my bass guitar named Big Bertha.
I like to read the news and write my own stories.

participant_2.background:
I'm passionate about photography and I have a great mentor in my father.
i just graduated high school with honors.
my favorite hero is superman.
i live in my parents basement.
i like to bike.

content.text: Hey there! How's your day going?
It's going well! I just graduated high school with honors, and I'm excited to start taking classes at the community college.
Congratulations! That's awesome. What are you going to study?
I'm not sure yet, but I'm thinking about majoring in business.
That's a great choice! Business is a very versatile field.
I know, right? I'm also really interested in photography, so I might minor in that as well.
Photography is a great hobby! I love taking pictures of my dog.
Aww, what kind of dog do you have?
I have a golden retriever named Buddy. He's the best dog in the world!
Golden retrievers are so cute! I love their fluffy tails.
Yeah, Buddy's tail is always wagging. He's always so happy.
That's great! I'm glad you have such a great dog.
Thanks! I'm really lucky to have him.
Me too! I'm glad we had this conversation.
Me too! It's always nice to meet new people.
